All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddPlayerToLobby
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client wants to join a lobby
AngleType
This enum is used to keep trace of what element is present in the corners of a Playable card and in its back-center.
ANSIFormatter
This class represents the colors used in the tui.
Board
This class represents a board for a player.
Card
This abstract class represents a general card with his id
CardNotDrawableException
This exception is used when the card is not drawable
CardNotOwnedException
This class sends a message when a card isn't owned by a player
Chat
This class represents a chat instance of the Game
ChatMessage
This class represents a message in a Chat
CheckBaseCardPlayed
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client chooses a base card
CheckChosenPawnColor
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client chooses a pawn color
CheckNPlayers
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when checking the number of players that have to join a game
CheckObjectiveCardChosen
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when checking the objective cards chosen by the players
ChooseNickname
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client chooses a nickname
ChooseObjectiveCard
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client chooses an objective card
ChoosePawnColor
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client chooses a pawn color.
ClientActionsInterface
This interface represents the actions which the clients (RMI and TCP) can perform.
ClientAvailableColors
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client wants to check the available pawn colors in a specific moment
ClientAvailableLobbies
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client wants to check the available lobbies in a specific moment
ClientGeneralInterface
This interface is useful for describing all the methods which a client can invoke for performing actions in the game
ClientHandlerThread
This class represents the Client (server-side) who chooses TCP as network protocol.
ClientLauncher
This class is the launcher for both RMI and TCP client.
ClientMessage
This interface represents messages sent by ClientSCK, which is the client side, to communicate with the server side.
ClientPing
This class is used to represent a ping, a message useful for detecting disconnections
ClientPong
This class is used to represent a message which is the pong, a message useful for detecting disconnections
ClientSCK
This class represents the Client who choose TCP as network protocol.
ColorAlreadyTakenException
This exception is used when a color has already been chosen
Coordinates
This class represents a couple of coordinates: (x,y)
CreateLobby
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client wants to create a new lobby
Deck
This abstract class represents a deck of cards of the same type
DeckIsFinishedException
This exception is thrown when a deck is finished
DrawCard
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client wants to draw a card
ErrorsAssociatedWithExceptions
This enum represents an EVENT, which is the answer that the server gives to the client, after a taken action.
Event
This interface is useful for all the updates notified by the model
ExceptionAssociatedWithAnEvent
This is the interface that associates an exception with an event.
FullLobbyException
This exception is thrown when a lobby is full and a player can't enjoy it.
Game
This class represents the instance of a single game started by the Server
Game.GameState
This enum represents the different states of the game
GameAlreadyStartedException
This exception is thrown when a game is already started.
GameController
This class is the controller of a game.
GameControllerInterface
This is the interface of gameController's methods
GameNotExistsException
This exception is thrown when a game doesn't exist.
GUIBaseCardController
This class represents the controller of the scene when choosing the base card
GUIGameController
This class controls the window during the game scene
GUILoadingController
This class represents the controller of the scene when choosing the nickname
GUILobbyController
This class represents the controller of the scene when loading the game
GUINicknameController
This class is uses to manage the nickname scene
GUIObjectiveController
This class controls the window during the objective scene
GUIPawnsController
This class controls the window during the pawns scene
GUIWinnersController
This class controls the window during the winner scene
InterfaceGUI
This class is the main class of the GUI, which launches the main application of JavaFX
InterfaceTUI
This class represents the tui.
NicknameAlreadyTakenException
This exception is thrown when a nickname is already taken.
ObjectiveCard
This class represents an objective card in the game
ObjectiveDeck
This class represent a deck which contains a stack of objective cards
Observable
This class represents an Observable, which is an object which can be modified, and all the modifications are communicated to the listeners (observers)
Observer
This class represents a listener to be added to the specific Observable.
OK
This event is useful to communicate that an operation was completed successfully and the client when receives it finishes his waiting activity
Pawn
This enum is used to identify which pawn the player has selected.
PlayableCard
This class represents a PlayableCard which can be one of the resource, gold or base ones
PlayableDeck
This class represents a deck: a group of cards of the same type
PlayBaseCard
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client wants to play a base card
PlayCard
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client wants to play a card
Player
This class represents a player in a game
Player.PlayerState
 
RMIClient
This class represents a client RMI RMI Client calls the remote methods through the ServerRMIInterface.
RMIServer
This class represents the RMI server, which is unique.
SCKMessage
This class defines a message that is used to pass information through the socket in a bidirectional way
SendMessage
This class is used to represent a message which is sent when a client wants to send a text in a chat
ServerAvailableColors
This class is used to represent a message sent by the server, when a client wants to choose pawn colors
ServerAvailableLobbies
This class is used to represent a message sent by the server, when a client wants to choose a lobby to join
ServerController
This class manages all the GameControllers and administrates nickname' selection.
ServerError
This class is used to represent a message sent by the server, when there's a error
ServerLauncher
This is the server.
ServerMessage
This interface is useful for server messages
ServerOk
This class is used to represent a message sent by the server to send a response of "OK"
ServerPing
This class is used to represent a message sent by the server to ask the client if he is connected
ServerPong
This class is used to represent a message sent by the server in response to a ping message
ServerRMIInterface
This interface represents the RMI server, which is unique.
ServerSCK
This class represents the Socket server, which is unique.
SetUpPhaseFinishedEvent
This event is useful to communicate that the game can start because all the players have all that is need to start the game
UpdateBoardEvent
This event is useful to communicate that the board of one player has been modified
UpdateChatEvent
This event is useful to communicate that one chat has been changed, because of new messages, and so it needs to be updated
UpdateChatMessageEvent
This event is useful to communicate that one chat has been changed, because of new messages, and so it needs to be updated
UpdateCommonObjectivesEvent
This event is useful to communicate that common objectives have been set
UpdateGameStateEvent
This event is useful to communicate that the game state has changed
UpdateGoldCard1Event
This event is useful to communicate that gold card 1 has changed
UpdateGoldCard2Event
This event is useful to communicate that gold card 2 has changed
UpdateGoldDeckEvent
This event is useful to communicate that gold deck has changed
UpdateLastMovesEvent
This event is useful to communicate that the number of last moves remained has changed
UpdatePersonalObjectiveEvent
This event is useful to communicate that personal objective has been set
UpdatePlayerDeckEvent
This event is useful to communicate that the player deck has changed
UpdatePlayerPawnEvent
This event is useful to communicate that player pawn has changed
UpdatePlayersOrderEvent
This event is useful to communicate that the playing order has changed
UpdateResourceCard1Event
This event is useful to communicate that resource card 1 has changed
UpdateResourceCard2Event
This event is useful to communicate that resource card 2 has changed
UpdateResourceDeckEvent
This event is useful to communicate that resource deck has changed
WinnerEvent
This event is useful to communicate the winners of the game (and the ranking)
WrappedObserver
This class represents an observer that contains a reference to a remote Client.
